nodes.text: The Yerej system was a star system located within the Tungra sector of the Outer Rim Territories.

During the Galactic Civil War, the system was the host to the Drekker Industries Special Materials Factory Drekker, an Imperial Deep Space Manufacturing Facility. It came under attack by a Rebel Alliance Nebulon-B escort frigate, the Meteor, and its squadrons of Z-95 Headhunters.
